fixes.name: Book Count Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR lodCount = CALCULATE(
    DISTINCTCOUNT('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Book Level 1]),
    ALL(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Book Level 1],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
    )
)
RETURN IF(lodCount > 6, "Dynamic Height", "Dynamic View")
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau LOD + COUNTD by using CALCULATE with DISTINCTCOUNT and ALL to remove filters on [Book Level 1] and [TERM_LABEL], then applied the IF test to return the two string outcomes.
